DOC.detailed_description: The demonstration project 3 major task implement concurrent , iterative phase : ( 1 ) implement MIND-Plus 2 community-based health service agency rapidly improve ability 600 community-living dually eligible old adult AD Baltimore region remain home improving care quality , enhance quality life , reduce total health care cost associate institutional care hospitalization ; ( 2 ) develop replicable model nationwide diffusion MIND program web-based certification package design prepare implementation , build work-force capacity training certification module , provide automate self-monitoring quality improvement tool ; ( 3 ) develop test detailed payment model take blend approach include provider care management fee provider performance incentive division share saving . The investigator hypothesize MIND-Plus dementia care coordination program ( 1 ) rapidly improve health & care quality reduce total health care cost among Medicare-Medicaid dually eligible community-living older adult AD , ( 2 ) drive health care system transformation create new CMS finance benefit would shift hub dementia care coordination well-trained , dementia competent , interdisciplinary team base community health agency , ( 3 ) achieve sustainable payment model produce significant net saving incentive provider performance . This `` shovel ready '' community-based model expect improve outcome within 6 month save estimate net-saving $ 12.5 million 3 year .
